Description: Foot and lower wall of Attic black-glazed pottery cup; ring foot, lightly grooved at top of outer face; glazed black on interior, exterior and top of foot; reserved: outer face of foot, resting surface and underside, which has a small circle and dot; incised inscription on underside. Castulo cup.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 546)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1666)
